mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_achievement(num, school_year, semester, classname, achievement, ordinary, point, nature, credit, finalexam) VALUES(#{num}, #{school_year}, #{semester}, #{classname}, #{achievement}, #{ordinary}, #{point}, #{nature}, #{credit}, #{finalexam})
mapper.select: select * from user_achievement where num = #{num} and school_year = #{school_year} and semester = #{semester}
